name: Fanmade Folio Volume 1-Mechanical Edition PF1e
description:
These are Free races and classes that need no introductions! I present to you the following:

Races

  • Anima from +Anima
  • Gerudo from Legend of Zelda
  • Gon from Blade and Soul
  • Goron from Legend of Zelda
  • Haiye Elf from Record of Agarest War
  • Jin from Blade and Soul
  • Lyn from Blade and Soul
  • Mudokon from Oddworld
  • Skull Kid from Legend of Zelda
  • Steef from Oddworld
  • Twili from Legend of Zelda
  • Varla from Record of Agarest War
  • Yun from Blade and Soul
  • Zora from  Legend of Zelda

Base Classes

  • Adept Rogue from .hack
  • BloodEdge from BlazBlue
  • Buster Soldier from Final Fantasy VII (7)
  • Chaos Incarnate from Final Fantasy VII (7)
  • Elysian Assassin from Dust: An Elysian Tale
  • Keyblade Master from Kingdom Hearts
  • Paradigm Soldier from Final Fantasy XIII (13)
  • Wonderland Warrior from American McGee's Alice: Madness Returns

Prestige Classes

  • Creed Assassin from Assassin's Creed
  • Disciple of the Orangutan from Donkey Kong 64
  • Dragonslayer from Berserk
  • Master of 'Rangs from Ty the Tasmanian Tiger
  • Wind Walker from Air Gear

Disclaimer: I do not claim to own the intellectual properties or rights to any of the material presented in this book, nor do I request any financial compensation of any sort for the materials contained here within.
